messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: there are [0-9]+ clusters'

Imagine a group of 21 scholars. Amir is connected to Wim, Raj, Jing, Wei, Nisha, and Reza. Sara is connected to Pari, Pam, Kim, Ian, Moin, and Puja. Zack is connected to Matt, Eva, Amy, Gia, Ming, and Prem. Nisha is connected to Reza, Wim, Raj, Jing, and Wei. Raj is connected to Jing, Wei, Reza, and Wim. Pam is connected to Jing, Kim, Ian, Moin, and Puja. Moin is connected to Puja, Pari, Kim, and Ian. Ming is connected to Prem, Matt, Eva, Amy, and Gia. Wei is connected to Reza, Wim, and Eva. Kim is connected to Ian, Puja, and Pari. Ian is connected to Puja and Pari. Gia is connected to Prem, Matt, Eva, and Amy. Reza is connected to Wim, and Jing. Puja is connected to scholars Pari. Prem is connected to Matt, Eva, and Amy. Wim is connected to Jing. Pari is connected to Amy. Amy is connected to Matt. Matt is connected to Eva. How many densely-connected scholar clusters do we have in this group? A densely-connected cluster is a group of scholars that are connected to themselves with a minimum of 2 scholars.

21 is the correct answer and should be highlighted.
A densely-connected cluster is a group of any number of scholars that are connected to themselves with a minimum of 2 scholars.
user: Imagine a group of 26 scholars. Amir is connected to Wim, Raj, Jing, Wei, Nisha, and Reza. Sara is connected to Pari, Pam, Kim, Ian, Moin, and Puja. Zack is connected to Matt, Eva, Amy, Gia, Ming, and Prem. Nisha is connected to Reza, Wim, Raj, and Jing. Raj is connected to Jing, Wei, and Reza. Pam is connected to Jing, Kim, Ian, Moin, and Puja. Pam is connected to Gia, Prem, Matt, Eva, and Amy. Moin is connected to Puja, Eva, Amy, and Gia. Ming is connected to Prem, Matt, Eva, and Amy. Prem is connected to Eva. How many densely-connected scholar clusters do we have in this group?
23 is the correct answer
A densely-connected cluster is a group of any number of scholars that are connected to themselves with a minimum of 2 scholars. Answer: there are 15 densely-connected clusters Answer: there are 21 densely-connected clusters Answer: there are 23 [scholars] densely-connected clusters
A scheduler for a project scheduling tool must be able to run and restart the project scheduler on any target instance in the cluster.
When the scheduler instance is started, it has to check if all the target clusters are ready to use. If this is the case, the scheduler instance should be terminated and the worker daemon should run at each target. If any of the target cluster instances is not ready to use, you have to wait to ensure that they are ready and once that is done you can start the scheduler again at all the target instances.
There is only one type of instance in the cluster and one type of task to assign to the instances.
Answer: There is only one type of task and there is more than one type of instance
There is more than one type of instance in the cluster and more than one type of task to assign to the instances.

Zack is connected to Matt, Eva, Amy, Gia, Ming, and Prem. Nisha is connected to Reza, Wim, Raj, and Jing. Raj is connected to Jing, Wei, and Reza. Pam is connected to Jing, Kim, Ian, Moin, and Puja. 23 is the correct answer
A densely-connected cluster is a group of any number of scholars that are connected to themselves with a minimum of 2 scholars. Answer: there are 15 densely-connected clusters Answer: there are 21 densely-connected clusters Answer: there are 23 [scholars] densely-connected clusters
A scheduler for a project scheduling tool must be able to run and restart the project scheduler on any target instance in the cluster.
When the scheduler instance is started, it has to check if all the target clusters are ready to use. If this is the case, the scheduler instance should be terminated and the worker daemon should run at each target. If any of the target cluster instances is not ready to use, you have to wait to ensure that they are ready and once that is done you can start the scheduler again at all the target instances.
There is only one type of instance in the cluster and one type of task to assign to the instances.
Answer: There is only one type of task and there is more than one type of instance
There is more than one type of instance in the cluster and more than one type of task to assign to the instances.
